text: David L. Frishberg (March 23, 1933 - November 17, 2021) is an American jazz pianist, vocalist, composer, and lyricist. He was born in Saint Paul, Minnesota. His songs have been performed by Blossom Dearie, Rosemary Clooney, Shirley Horn, Anita O'Day, Michael Feinstein, Irene Kral, Diana Krall, Stacey Kent, John Pizzarelli and Mel Torm√©. Frishberg wrote the music and lyrics for "I'm Just a Bill" for the ABC Schoolhouse Rock! series. Frishberg died on November 17, 2021 in Portland, Oregon at the age of 88.Dave Frishberg, Writer of Songs Sardonic and Nostalgic, Dies at 88 ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American jazz musicians Category:American jazz singers Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American composers Category:Musicians from Saint Paul, Minnesota Category:Singers from Minnesota Category:Writers from Saint Paul, Minnesota
title: Dave Frishberg
